sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text: This Act may be cited as the Ephedra Prohibition Act.

sections.heading: Findings.
sections.text: The General Assembly finds the following:

sections.heading: Purpose.
sections.text:
The purpose of this Act is to ban the sale of all
dietary
supplements
containing ephedrine alkaloids in the State of Illinois regardless of the age
of the purchaser in order to
protect the health and public safety of Illinois residents.

sections.heading: Effective date.
sections.text: This Act shall take effect upon becoming law.
